title: @Riot KateyKhaos Aurelion Sol?
body: Hey Katey! I know you're in skins but you're like the most active Rioter on the boards, so any chance you can provide some info about Aurelion Sol's release? I thought champs were released with the patch update?

replies.body:
You've probably figured it out, but he's now available! :D 

We generally don't announce release dates in advance.
Haha always saving posts for the dramatic comments. Thanks Katey!

I believe it will be some hours 
https://scontent.fbne1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpf1/v/t1.0-0/p240x240/12039762_1043095649094055_2005686527190641272_n.jpg?oh=1c5e31bb9ff4b99264fa3ea5f485fbf7&oe=57838D1E 
he's available in pick and ban as well as champ info

Not sure if they will answer as tons of threads have been made about it.
Though as im reading it will probably be later today or tommorrow for his release but these are only rumors sorry {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
